title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
Title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat with Easy-Cinch Carrier Strap – Teal, 72" x 24", 2/5" Thick NBR Foam

Overview:
Find your flow and cushion every move with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. Designed for comfort and support, this extra-thick NBR foam mat reduces pressure on joints during yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises. Lightweight and portable with an included easy-cinch carrier strap, it’s your go-to mat for studio sessions, home workouts, and everything in between.

Key Features:
- Extra-thick comfort: 2/5-inch (10 mm) cushioning helps protect knees, elbows, and wrists.
- Soft, supportive NBR foam: Gentle on joints while providing steady support for poses and core work.
- Generous size: 72 inches long x 24 inches wide for ample space to move and stretch.
- Lightweight and portable: Weighs just 3.11 pounds for easy carry to class or the park.
- Easy-cinch carrier strap included: Securely roll, strap, and go.
- Versatile use: Ideal for yoga, Pilates, stretching, core training, and floor exercises.
- Stylish teal color: Fresh, vibrant look for your practice space.

Specifications:
- Dimensions: 72 in (L) x 24 in (W)
- Thickness: 2/5 in (approx. 10 mm)
- Weight: 3.11 lb
- Material: NBR foam
- Color: Teal
- Included: Easy-cinch yoga mat carrier strap

Why You’ll Love It:
This mat pairs plush cushioning with dependable stability, making it a solid choice for beginners and seasoned practitioners alike. The NBR foam feels comfortable under pressure points without feeling spongy, and the included strap keeps your mat tidy and travel-ready.

Care Tips:
- Wipe down after use with a mild soap and water solution; air dry flat.
- Store rolled in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

What’s in the Box:
- Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat (Teal)
- Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap

Perfect For:
- Yoga flows, restorative sessions, and meditation
- Pilates and core-strength routines
- Stretching, mobility, and floor-based workouts

Elevate your practice with comfortable cushioning, portable convenience, and trusted Gaiam quality.
